data.message: I'm confused as to why Drake would want to humiliate himself in a battle with the absolute best rapper-artist-poet-writer of all time. I can't take Drake seriously at all. I just think of Degrassi. Eminem is and will always be the best. If Rap was in the Olympics he'd have more Gold than Simone Biles. #respect
